events.title: Total lunar eclipse (Mar 13â€“14, 2025)
events.description: The Moon enters Earth's umbra, creating a total lunar eclipse visible across the Americas, Europe, Africa, and parts of Asia.

events.title: Partial solar eclipse (Mar 29, 2025)
events.description: A partial solar eclipse visible across parts of North America, Europe, Africa, and Asia; proper eye protection required at all times.

events.title: Total solar eclipse (Aug 12, 2026)
events.description: Totality path crosses Greenland, Iceland, Atlantic, Portugal, and northern Spain; a rare event over continental Europe.
